meaning of "decision", "administrative character", "under an enactment"
administrative decisions (judicial review) act 1977 (cth), ss. 3 , 5 , 6 , 13

federal court rules , o. 54, r. 4. the applicant had been a candidate for admission as a patent-attorney. he sat for three subjects in an examination and was notified that he had failed in two of them. he requested a statement of reasons under s. 13 of the administrative decisions (judicial review) act 1977 (the act) and also, inter alia, sought copies of his answers to the papers in which he had failed. lengthy reasons for his failure were provided, but the board of examiners refused to furnish him with copies of his answers.
